mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(d.type) from sys_pro_check d LEFT JOIN quote c on c.id=d.content_id LEFT JOIN inquiry b on b.id=c.inquiry_id LEFT JOIN sys_pro_detail a on a.id=b.pro_detail_id where a.id = #{proDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT pro.`name` as pro_name, i.`name` as inquiry_name, q.supplier as quote_supplier, q.su_model as quote_su_model, q.su_brand as quote_su_brand, q.su_price as quote_su_price, q.su_params as quote_su_params, c.technical_audit as technical_audit, c.business_audit as business_audit FROM inquiry i LEFT JOIN quote q on i.id = q.inquiry_id LEFT JOIN sys_pro_check c on q.id = c.quote_id LEFT JOIN sys_pro_detail pro on pro.id = i.pro_detail_id WHERE i.is_active = 1 and q.is_active = 1 AND pro.is_active = 1 AND c.business_audit = 0 ORDER BY pro.time desc
